name: Escape, a Shmup
description:
Submission for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2018.

Done by me, Narsis

Made in Gamemaker Studio 2

---

You are a crack pilot on a mission deep in enemy territory when your ship takes massive damage.  With only your weapons, some wit, and barely enough flight control to not crash into the ground, can you escape the onslaught of foes?

---

Oh and there's fractals.  :)
